title: Claude Code Skill Frontmatter Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating YAML frontmatter in Claude Code SKILL.md files

name.description: Skill identifier (lowercase, hyphens only, max 64 chars)

description.description: What skill does and when to use it (max 1024 chars, no XML tags)
examples: Generate semantic commit messages from git diffs following Conventional Commits. Use when writing commit messages or staging changes.

allowed-tools.description: Comma-separated list of tools Claude can use during skill execution
examples: Bash, Read, Write, Grep, Glob, Edit

tags.description: Categories for skill organization and discovery

homepage.description: URL to skill documentation or repository

repository.description: URL to skill source code repository

keywords.description: Search keywords for skill discovery (deprecated, use tags instead)
